GET:
WITH logged_user AS (
            SELECT
                user_id,
                user_is_admin,
                user_is_inactive
            FROM users u
            JOIN session s ON u.user_id = s.session_user_id
            WHERE (#string:session-token# IS NOT NULL) AND (s.session_token = #string:session-token#)
            LIMIT 1
        )

        SELECT 
            b.bait_id as id,
            b.bait_name as name,
            b.bait_image_filename as img_filename,
            b.bait_note as note
        FROM
            logged_user lu,
            bait b
        WHERE
            (lu.user_is_inactive = false)
        GROUP BY
            b.bait_id
        ORDER BY
            b.bait_id
